description: The notification sent when a network failover event occurs

event.Summary: Failover : Primary network interface $v1 failed; Secondary network interface $v2 connected

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD OG-FAILOVER-MIB::ogfovrEventOccurred OG-FAILOVER-MIB::ogfovrEventPrimary s EXAMPLE OG-FAILOVER-MIB::ogfovrEventSecondary s EXAMPLE

description: The name of the network interface which failed
variables.name: OG-FAILOVER-MIB::ogfovrEventPrimary

description: The name of the network interface which was connected instead
variables.name: OG-FAILOVER-MIB::ogfovrEventSecondary
